Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 110th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/3/2015, off Dennis Moore (MON)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/2015, off Thomas Svoboda (DET)...
Injured on 7/16/2015 with a Concussion, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/3/2016, hitting .316 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
8/15/2017: Signed a contract extension with San Francisco, $11,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/2018, hitting .346 with 5 HR, 12 RBI...
Injured on 8/9/2018 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove at First Base in 2018...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/12/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 4/17/2020.
Released by Houston on 6/15/2020...
